backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to impacted frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend source file.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind setup and OKLCH theme variables with light/dark palettes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component rendering the Slideshow inside a full‑height container.
Heart‑collecting mini‑game where tapping spawns animated hearts and triggers a completion message at 50 points.
frontend/src/components/MusicControls.ts: Music enable/disable switch and volume slider bound to local audio settings.
frontend/src/components/ShayariSlide.tsx: Displays a 4‑line shayari poem over a gradient‑overlaid background image.
frontend/src/components/SlideIndicator.t: Shows slide progress with animated dots and a numeric counter.
frontend/src/components/Slideshow.tsx: Controls slide navigation, swipe handling, background music, and renders shayari slides plus the ending mini‑game.
frontend/src/data/shayari.ts: Defines the Shayari type and exports seven 4‑line romantic poems.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates a backend actor tied to the current identity and refreshes dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, logout, stored identity loading, and client setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocalAudioSettings: Manages local audio enable/volume settings with persistence in localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder hook returning no queries since all data is local.
frontend/src/hooks/useSwipeNavigation.ts: Adds touch swipe detection on an element to trigger left/right navigation callbacks.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus custom romantic theme colors, typography, and animations.
frontend/src/lib/randomNoRepeat.ts: Utility that returns a function to pick random items without repeating the previous one.
frontend/src/lib/speak.ts: Wrapper for browser speech synthesis to speak text with optional voice settings.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry initializing React, query client, and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: JSON describing the project’s current features, requirements, and architectural notes.
